home.title: Hi! I'm Surya
home.description:
I'm a Technology EnthusiastðŸš€, a creative problem solver; with a constantly growing love for technologies. Passionate about ideating, conceptualizing and producing consumer-centric as well as technology-enabled products from level zero.

I spent most of my spare times, contemplating these questions:

`Why I am thinking and acting like this?`

`What motivates me to do what I am doing now?`

`What motivates me, does the same motivates others also?`
